franchise_client_sources_description: Our platform provides a steady stream of qualified clients who need real estate and financial services. You receive quality and guaranteed referrals:
franchise_final_cta_title:
Ready to succeed together?
Join TechRealt franchise today!
franchise_hero_description: Join Israel's leading franchise network and establish a successful business in real estate and finance. We provide a comprehensive platform, professional training, and complete support for all our partners.
franchise_hero_title: TechRealt Franchise - The Perfect Partnership for You
franchise_includes_turnkey_benefit_brand: Rights to use the established brand
franchise_includes_turnkey_benefit_offic: Fully equipped office with all necessary equipment
franchise_main_hero_title: Strategic Business Opportunity in Real Estate
franchise_partnership_description: Partnership with TechRealt provides a professional and advanced platform for managing real estate businesses. We offer a variety of services:
franchise_partnership_title: Partnership with TechRealt - Professionalism and Profitability
franchise_pricing_note: Prices include full equipment, training, and ongoing support
franchise_step_1_description: Contact our representative for detailed information about the conditions and requirements for opening a franchise.
franchise_step_2_description: We will jointly examine your professional and personal suitability for activities in the real estate field.
franchise_step_3_description: After approval of suitability, we will sign a franchise agreement and mutual commitments.
franchise_step_4_description: You will undergo comprehensive professional training in all aspects of our activities and services.
franchise_step_5_description: Official opening of the office with full support in marketing and finding first clients.
get_program: Get the most suitable programs for your needs
get_program_text: We'll find programs with the best terms for you
get_program_text_tablet: We'll find programs with the best terms for you
has_account: Do you have an existing account?
has_other_property_question: Do you have other property besides what was purchased with mortgage/credit?
has_savings_question: Do you have savings that are not included in the mortgage down payment?
have_mortgage_title: Is the property in question subject to mortgage lien or secured debt obligation?
how_it_works_text: Our mortgage calculator allows you to calculate the most suitable mortgage for you in real time. All you need to do is enter the required details and click the calculate button. Our mortgage calculator provides various enhanced mortgage programs from leading market providers.
income_hint: Amount specified after tax deduction confirmed by accountant
initial_payment_tooltip:
Primary residence: Borrower has no property - maximum financing up to 75%

Alternative residence: Borrower has property which they commit to sell within two years - maximum financing up to 70%

Second home and above: Borrower already owns property - maximum financing up to 50%
lawyer_success_message: Thank you for your submission. We have received your details and our representative will contact you shortly
lawyers_about_button: Select Real Estate in One Click
lawyers_about_description: TechRealt provides its clients and partners with a unified digital service for buying, selling, renting and leasing real estate. The service is currently in development.
lawyers_advantage_client_management: Digital Client Management through CRM System
lawyers_advantage_digital_crm: Digital client management through CRM system
lawyers_advantage_digital_platform: Access to Digital platform and 24/7 support
lawyers_advantage_digital_title: Digital Services for Successful Business Development
lawyers_benefit_expansion_desc: Access to new clients through our professional platform
lawyers_benefit_leads_desc: Pre-qualified clients with substantiated legal requirements
lawyers_benefit_partnership_desc: Stable cooperation framework with mutually beneficial terms
lawyers_collaboration_advantage_crm: Digital Client Management through CRM System
lawyers_collaboration_advantage_platform: Access to Digital Platform and 24/7 Support
lawyers_collaboration_advantages_subtitl: Digital Services for Successful Business Development
lawyers_collaboration_floating_crm: Digital Client Management through CRM System
lawyers_cta_title: Become Our Partner and Earn Together with Us
lawyers_earning_card_description: Be confident in your success with TechRealt! We provide exclusive clients so you can focus on your professional work. At the end of the month, we invoice you based on the number of successful cases. Minimum risks - maximum earning opportunities.
lawyers_earning_card_title: Exclusive clients, earn without risks: Our partnership - your success!
lawyers_earnings_info_card_description: Ensure confidence in your practice development with TechRealt! We provide exclusive client referrals enabling you to concentrate on delivering exceptional legal services. Monthly billing is calculated based on successful case completions. Minimal risk exposure — maximum revenue generation opportunities.
lawyers_earnings_info_card_title: Exclusive Client Referrals, Risk-Free Earnings: Our Strategic Partnership — Your Professional Success!
lawyers_hero_title: Expand Your Clientele: Strategic Partnership with Techrealt for Legal Practitioners
lawyers_partnership_title: Become our partner and earn together with us
lawyers_process_step_1_description: Complete our comprehensive professional registration form on our platform to initiate your partnership with our referral network.
lawyers_process_step_2_description: Following application review, our partnership representative will conduct a detailed consultation to discuss partnership terms and answer your inquiries. We will review your application and make a collaboration decision.
lawyers_process_step_3_description: We formalize our partnership through the execution of a comprehensive agency service agreement under favorable terms for you.
lawyers_process_step_4_description: Upon successful partnership establishment, we will systematically transfer our clients requiring legal assistance to you. We provide comprehensive access to your full professional profile and practice information on our business card platform.
lawyers_process_step_5_description: You receive: Exclusive client access, Digital platform access with 24/7 support, Cost-effective marketing solutions. We invoice based on your workload volume and the number of clients provided under individualized terms.
lawyers_step_1_desc: Simply fill out a short form on our website to join our referral program
lawyers_step_1_title: Fill Out Form on Our Website
lawyers_step_2_desc: After filling out the form, our representative will contact you to discuss details and answer your questions. We will review your application and make a decision about cooperation.
lawyers_step_3_desc: We sign an agency agreement for services provision on terms favorable to you.
lawyers_step_3_title: We Sign Agency Agreement for Services
lawyers_step_4_desc: In case of winning the tender, we will transfer clients who need legal help to you. We provide access to upload complete information about you and your activities on the business card website
lawyers_step_4_title: We Transfer Our Clients Who Need Legal Help
lawyers_step_5_desc:
You receive:

Exclusive clients
Access to Digital platform and 24/7 support
Savings on advertising costs

We bill based on work volume and number of clients provided to you on individual terms
mest: Foreign resident according to income tax law is a person residing abroad or not meeting the definition of Israeli resident for tax purposes
